tool_description: Make your onboarding process safer, faster, and smarter by verifying the legitimacy of your merchants using their import export certification. With the Import Export verification API, you can confidently onboard merchants knowing that they are genuine entities, registered under the Registrar of Companies, and authorized to partake in the import and export of products.

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Fetch API result using the request ID received in responses.

required_parameters.name: request_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the request to fetch results.

api_list.name: Import Export Verification
api_list.description: Verify the legitimacy of merchants using their import export certification. This API allows you to onboard merchants confidently.
